The word "basic" comes from the Greek word "basis" which indicates foundation. "Basic" relates to the properties of acidity and alkalinity. These situations are established at the foundation of the cells that the foods are made up of. So an external treatment doesn't adjust a food from acid to alkaline. Maybe one of the most important differences in between acid and alkaline foods are their partnership to cancer. Cancerous tissues are acidic, and wellbeing tissues are alkaline.
